S.FORM: == lalusa == u zuma a kamu sa u pangkiw. lalusa cunus lalusa mahiza ku cacay. cacay ku tuud, palecadhan sa, u lalusa tu . u sulit nu Hulam 12 は, . u sulit nu Amilika One half is the irreducible fraction resulting from dividing one by two ( 1⁄2), or the fraction resulting from dividing any number by its double. Multiplication by one half is equivalent to division by two, or halving; conversely, division by one half is equivalent to multiplication by two, or "doubling". One half appears often in mathematical equations, recipes, measurements, etc. Half can also be said to be one part of something divided into two equal parts. u sapuelac nu masatekeday a sulit lalusa: 一半 malalusa: 一半的 lalusan: 用一半 tinaku ku kamu u Sakizaya (lalusa) Cecay ku tuki ayza ku lalusa iza ciniza a tayni. (Amilika a kamu: He came at 1:30.) (malalusa) malalusa nu pawti ku kalitang. (Amilika a kamu: Peanut installed half of the bag.) malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinenganː 2分の1 One half

== lalosa == o zoma a kamo sa o pangkiw. lalosa conos lalosa mahiza ko cacay. cacay ko tood, palecadhan sa, o lalosa to . o solit no Holam 12 は, . o solit no Amilika One half is the irredocible fraction resolting from dividing one by two ( 1⁄2), or the fraction resolting from dividing any nomber by its dooble. Moltiplication by one half is eqoivalent to division by two, or halving; conversely, division by one half is eqoivalent to moltiplication by two, or "doobling". One half appears often in mathematical eqoations, recipes, measorements, etc. Half can also be said to be one part of something divided into two eqoal parts. o sapoelac no masatekeday a solit lalosa: 一半 malalosa: 一半的 lalosan: 用一半 tinako ko kamo o Sakizaya (lalosa) Cecay ko toki ayza ko lalosa iza ciniza a tayni. (Amilika a kamo: He came at 1:30.) (malalosa) malalosa no pawti ko kalitang. (Amilika a kamo: Peanot installed half of the bag.) malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinenganː 2分の1 One half
